TSSigTyp

protected TSSigTyp()
. 
 Used options (stored within mask of 'TSOpt'):
  0 to 15 - not used
       16 - Signal-Script available
       17 -
       18 - SignalFlags: Semaphore
       19 - SignalFlags: No_Gantry
       20 - SignalFlags: ABS
       21 - SignalFlags: DIR_Display
       22 -
       31 - Reserved (used for temporary marker)
